Package com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.Player

Class PlayerDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ihuntwithjavalins.Player.PlayerDB
  • public class PlayerDB
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerDB is a class which handles all database operations for Player objects. Much functionality is derived from Well Fed project example given by TA

      Constructor for the PlayerDB class, initializes declared fields
